title: The Experience Factor
description: Prospects like professional athletes should be wary of advisory firms with short track records, says Rockefeller Capital Management's Michael Bapis.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Prospects like professional athletes should be wary of advisory firms with short track records, says Rockefeller Capital Management's Michael Bapis.
